txt.en:
'Listen.

'We lose Grimwood.

'Take it back. Get help. Trees have hearts. Get hearts. Put hearts on stump near Grimwood. Call Trees.

'Trees stomp t√¢rks good.

'Go now and get hearts to make trees angry!'
'Quickly now, take those talons to the lumber camp and place them on the flat-top stump. The scent alone should draw the wolves to combat.'

To retake the Grimwood the forces of Angmar will need to be vigilant and  assisted, so thinks Taskmaster Gazgortag. He thinks that the living trees near the lumber camp will come and fight for the forces of Angmar and sets you to the task of calling them to the fight.
Place the heartwood on the stump

Seek a Leafcull Huorn within the southern stretches of the Grimwood. Cut out its heart and place it on the stump near the Grimwood Lumber Camp.\n\nTaskmaster Gazgortag believes that you can draw the Huorns into conflict with the Free People currently occupying the Grimwood Lumber Camp. He directed you to cut out the heart of the leafcull Huorn in attempt to draw out the enemy.
